summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of East Pike Street, from Thirty-seventh Avenue to Thirty-eighth Avenue et al, in the City of Seattle, by grading et al, under Ordinance No. 14987, creating Local Improvement District No. 1341 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
